Hey I hear you might be going to DG's Halloween party!!! I will be there
and I think Doug will be there too! Long time no talk! Hope all is well,
we really need to have dinner sometime in the near future!
How are things going at Enron?
xox,
Vera

just let you know when I drop it off at your house.

Rick and I will be involved as well. If you have any questions,
please let us know. Thanks. Lynn

Any more news on next week? Are you still flying in at 10:00 pm. I want to let mom know a little in advance if you want to go to Vero.  I cannot believe Larry Dierker resigned, although he probably would have been fired anyway.  This Saturday is full of great games and of couse I have to work until 2:00, ridiculous.  Later
